website_summaries.verdict: A simple, yet cozy window perch for a resting cat to gain the best vantage point both indoors and out.
pros: PVC piping frame and rugged woven fabric platform
Large suction cups secure the cot to a large window
cons: Kitties like to play with the stainless steel cable and suction cups, which often dislodges the suction cups from the window

website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch cat perch is well worth considering if you're looking for a durable and reliable single-level model. A worthy contender for first place.
pros: Features patented giant suction cups with each individual cup boasting a maximum weight capacity of 12 pounds
Heavy-duty stainless steel cables are stable and durable
Ultra strong frame is constructed of thick PVC pipes
Comes with the Humane Society's stamp of approval
cons: Large size might not fit standard windows

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product!
customer_reviews.text: At first my cat loved it. However last night one of the suction cups popped off and the cord somehow wrapped around my cats foot. He was stuck hanging by his foot. It cut his foot and he was bleeding everywhere. If I had not been home he could have gotten seriously injured. I do not recommend buying this, and if you do buy it only use it while you are home with your cat...
customer_reviews.author: Kellene R.

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved it so much I just bought a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I am posting a pic...it is sturdy enough to hold both my cats, and Otis (the orange tabby) is a 15 pounder! It is solid, never loosens, we have repositioned it and it's good as new. and the cats truly love it. Can't say enough good about them!
customer_reviews.author: Carly L.

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups do not stay...and I even purchased new ones from Kitty Cot
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, and I followed the directions to a “T”, but one of the suction cups will never stay up for a long period of time. All it takes is one time of a cat jumping on this for one or more suction cups to come down, and they will never use it again - which is precisely where we are at with it. I won’t risky my cat getting injured so this is money down the drain...
customer_reviews.author: jag1018

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups DON'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: After only 5 months, the suction cups lost their shape, failed, and down went the Kitty Cot! Replacement suction cup sets available by the seller cost nearly $20 (nice profit margins!) so prepare to spend $20 a few times a year just to keep this product functional. Really nice in the beginning 100% not worth it in the long run
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: My two kitty rescues are taking to this nicely. I bought two
customer_reviews.text: My two kitty rescues are taking to this nicely. I bought two, and sometimes they sleep together on the same one. Both cots have stayed put since they were placed a month ago. A little fake sheep skin gives it a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Benter

customer_reviews.title: pricey and not durable like stated.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this but it’s not very durable. I have to hot glue the seems shut over 4 times because its not Sewn very well. 1 stars because I think the price is a bit high for the quality. Definitely does not hold 25lbs one cat is 12ish and the other 9.5. And this is the result.....
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Ugly. Not worth price paid. Better value options out there.
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK. The material is super cheap feeling all around (mesh cat sits on is thin cheap looking plastic for example. the white corner plastic pieces don’t match the black components. I am returning it as the value isn’t there. $44 (without tax nor shipping) is pricey for an entirely molded piece of plastic and basic design. Plenty of other options for half the price w similar reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Sad cats.  Sad owner.
customer_reviews.text: I am DEEPLY disappointed in these replacement suction cups. My first Kitty Cot was ordered on 11/1/2015, and our cats loved it so much that I ordered one for multiple family members that Christmas. As you can see from the photos, even our 18-lb American Eskimo dog enjoyed the Kitty Cot! Last spring (year and a half after purchase), the suction cups failed. No more suction I was bitter, because the cats would look at me with SUCH. GREAT. SORROW. when they walked up to their collapsed cozy bed. Eventually (10/23/17), I ordered replacement cups. They worked inconsistently for about 6 weeks. Unfortunately, now will not hold suction. Sad cats. Sad pups. Sad owner.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia H. Methvin

customer_reviews.title: All my nine furry monsters love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. I have 9 cats, and it hasn't fell down once. The suction cups on the top have come off but the bottom two hold it so well that the entire thing doesn't even budge. Some of my cats are small...and some are pretty darn fat. I've walked in to find one of the fat ones with two of the smaller ones squished together on it. If you have one cat or multiple cats I recommend this, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulnextdoor

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay up, scares cat
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty cot was ok for a month or so but now keeps falling down, not worth the price. The wires holding it were never even but when the suction was stronger that was ok. Now it falls down when my cat jumps on it and scares him.
customer_reviews.author: Chris's Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Sturdy build, and kitty is obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely loves this perch! If he's not within eyesight when I'm at home, I always find him in the perch - either napping or watching the action in the great outdoors. The perch is very sturdy and well-made. Highly recommend. By the way - this self-warming crate mat 14"x22" fits perfectly on the perch to add warmth is colder climates:
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Best Thing I Ever Bought for my Cats
customer_reviews.text: My Cats LOVE THIS!!! They are on it all the time! At first, I thought that the suction cups would not work, but it holds up both of my cats, Mika (18 lbs) and Nala (15 lbs). Just make sure to follow instructions and that the perch is perfectly level perpendicular to the window. A slightest tilt will make the cups slide. Its perfect for my apartment where I cannot use screws. It is currently on my sliding glass window so they can look outside and people watch :) If you have cats, get this for them because... THIS IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Second order cheaper flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second kitty cot I have purchased. See second photo. The first one is made with a very strong durable material. The second one I ordered. ( see second photo) is a flimsy nearly see through material. Disappointing. And considering this is simply cheap PVC pipe and this is not a cheap cat perch you would think they could stick with quality material. The suction cups are great. But honestly everything else is now incredibly cheap and I would not spend the money on this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Robi

customer_reviews.title: Last only seven to eight months
customer_reviews.text: They work well - but they last only seven to eight months for us. I need a subscription for these suction cups! Ok, heavily used, often two cats use it together. The window is squeaky clean before applying the suction cups, I even use smelly Windex. Double pane window, does get full sun. After seven or eight months, the cot crashes down with a bewildered cat or two on it. Now that I know how short they last, I will exchange proactively before any crashes happen. After these crashes, the cot is now somewhat less popular among the pocket lions here.
customer_reviews.author: Green Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great perch!
customer_reviews.text: My cat, Leo, loves his new window perch! You really have to make sure that your window is clean before you install it though. Otherwise the cot can fall down. The only other drawback is that my cat can sometimes have a hard time getting up onto the perch since the metal cords make the side entry rather narrow. He's a big kitty so he may need a bigger perch. Regardless, something to think about if your cat is as big as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The monsters love it...
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it although it took them a while to get used to it. Husband thought for sure the suction cups would be too strong for our older windows but they've never moved & are still going strong. Our oldest cat is nicknamed "Hammy" for a reason, but even she has no problems with getting in it and having it be secure. Its a simple design, but sometimes those are best! Would love if it came in cuter colors but we just tossed an old hand towel on it and no one cares, least of all the cats.
customer_reviews.author: S.P. Winks

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I couldn’t get the suction cups to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I couldn’t get the suction cups to fit tightly in the pvc holes. I finally kinda got the suction cups on, stuck it on the window and immediately fell off. The suction cups stayed on the window though.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: last one you will EVER buy
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this !!!! Worth every penny, I have bought and returned many that looked sturdy and had good reviews, but others lied !! The fold up feature is great. my 23 lb loves it and his brother, 14 lbs share it in morning sun, and thats alot of CAT !! Has never slipped from glass once and I bought one for my friend to put heavy plants on, her home has a wall of glass, works/looks great !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aes

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are awful.
customer_reviews.text: These suction cups are horrible. This thing falls at least once a month and always in a disturbing fashion for my cats. I ordered replacement cups and they were just as awful. Will hold for a while and just randomly crash. Awful. I've had this for 5 years now so plenty of evidence. I had to make my own rig just so this thing would not drop my cats.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Failing after only 3 months
customer_reviews.text: How do I request a refund or exchange on this product? I’ve had it three months and it’s already starting to fall (and my cat with it) every time! Super annoyed and disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Haile

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE these cots!! They are the best!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t tell you how nice this is!!! it is AMAZING! The beds are individually made and the quality shows. I already have two, but just had to buy a third cot because our cats like them so much. Nice looking, comfortable and strong. We have had two cots up for a year; the suction cups held regardless of weather. (The main complaint for most other cots is the suction cups don’t hold; but these are great. They hold even our big, 20 lb. cat.) Hint to get the cat’s in the cot: I put their favorite blanket in it so it smelled familiar. They went in it immediately. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Sep

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Kitty Kot—-twice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Kitty Kot and our cat loved it! So much that we ordered it again. Instead of receiving what we ordered previously and what was pictured, we received something made of a completely different slick material. Sent it back with a note that we wanted the same Kitty Kot as our prior purchase. Replacement sent of the same shiny, slick material. Frustrating. So since I’m reviewing our recent Kitty Kot purchase, which we returned twice, have to go with one star.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jannsen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Got the deluxe size and it’s Sturdy. Holds both my cats which weigh 8-10 lbs each. They both lay in it together and watch the birds for hours. Ordering a second one just so they have more room.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on our sliding glass door
customer_reviews.text: Having no window sills in our house and 3 cats, I'm always looking for ways to help them find cozy spots in front of the windows. This is a great solution. We have it on our sliding glass door overlooking the deck. The suction cups are very sturdy and I haven't had any issues with them staying put. Oddly, only 1 of our 3 cats actually uses this, but they each have their favorite spots in the house. The 1 that does use it uses it all the time. He watches the world go by, sits in the sun, or just sleeps there. So I guess maybe it's not for every cat, but it was worthwhile for our house.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just what every house cat needs.
customer_reviews.text: These window cots bring joy to my cats and I. I love seeing my cats enjoy looking outside and basking in the sun in these window units. They fold up nicely at night so we can close our honeycomb blinds. We added other suction cups to hold up the cat cots at night. Thanks to the design, we can do that. These are definitely worth the money. They are sturdy and easy to clean. A must-have for any indoor cat. Ps. Give your cat time to get comfortable with them.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Freely

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter's beloved cat. It was very easy to set up with amusing and very thorough directions. We placed a familiar, cozy blanket on it as shown in the photo and the cat took to it instantly. She now spends many hours snoozing away in the warm spot where we've placed the perch and uses it with or without the blanket on top. I like that it's well constructed and easy to move to a different spot if we so desire. This is a very nice gift for a cat lover or a loved cat.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Ma

customer_reviews.title: Revised: Pretty Good Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Revising my review to upgrade this to 4 stars. Originally I gave this 2 stars because it wouldn't stay stuck to the window. Fell down a couple times with the cat on it. Luckily, we kept with it for a bit and on the 4th try couple days later it adhered nicely and the suction cups stayed put. Kitty luckily was willing to keep trying it out also and now she is in it all the time. Maybe it was the cleaner I used on the window beforehand? Taking a star off because of the troubleshooting required but glad it finally worked!
customer_reviews.author: DC Bibliophile

customer_reviews.title: Original World's Best Window Breaker
customer_reviews.text: I had been eyeing the Kitty Cot in my Cart for about a year but hesitated buying it because my cat is 17 lbs and I worried that he would be too heavy for it. However, based on all the great reviews of fat cat owners that love the XL size I was so excited to finally give it a try. I cleaned the window, firmly pushed the suction cups in between the two sides of the window, and CRACK, the left window just shatters. My boyfriend hit me with an "I told you so" before our cat even got to try it once. What an expensive and dangerous bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: This was an instant hit with my cat. She won't sleep anywhere else now. I recommend this bed cushion for this cot since it's very soft and fits perfectly. Picture is without the cushion since it hadn't come in the mail yet.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Is your cat "fluffy"? Buy this window seat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kitty window seat to replace one that was very similar, but less sturdy. This seat is fairly indestructible. The wires are actual metal cords, unlike the other models which use some kind of glorified fishing line that my cat loves to bite. With this model there's no worrying that she will bite the cords and crash to the ground. The frame also seems to hold her better, when she's in it, it doesn't bow or bend or tip downward from her heft. This is an amazing high quality sturdy cat window seat and if you're on the fence because of the price- just get it. It's absolutely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Love this kitty cot!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 kitties - one of them has no interest ( to be fair, she's not interested in much ;) ) and the other, Nubbers, loves it! Nubbers spends probably half of her day on it, even before I put up the window bird feeder for her. It's pretty sturdy but the suction cups do wear out eventually - our first set stopped sticking after 2 years which I think is pretty good. We got some of the replacement cups and it was all good! Definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Alisabeth Brouwer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. I have two
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I have two, slightly on the larger side, cats. About 14-15 pounds per cat. (not overweight per say, just large cats.) They fit on this perfectly. When I first hung it up, it creaked and moaned a little, which concerned me a little, and scared the cats a little... however as the days have continued on, it sits perfectly on my sliding glass door so the cats can people-watch all day. It is fairly high up on the door, so they jump to reach it, and so far it sits unfazed by the weight. I did put a small blanket on it, because the fabric on the bed is not the most comfortable feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna K.

customer_reviews.title: ... about our big 16lb cat being able to fit comfortably and stay safe
customer_reviews.text: While we were initially worried about our big 16lb cat being able to fit comfortably and stay safe, we were optimistic based on reviews and photos (especially those of two cats lounging together - if it could withstand two regular cats, surely ours would be safe?) Well, needless to say, he loves it. He uses it both for napping and for gazing out the window, and we're satisfied with this as an alternative to some of other less attractive cat loungers out there on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cheap options
customer_reviews.text: We had a nearly identical model purchased from Walmart, but the suction cups kept coming off, and the material was not sewed shut around all 4 tubes (to save shipping costs, I assume, so that the kit is folded down). This product is sewed all the way around, and looks MUCH better. The suction cups are perfectly clear and provide a much more secure seal. They don't slide or peel away like the cheap version. It is absolutely worth the extra $ to buy this, plus you are helping a small business owner.
customer_reviews.author: Adoniram

customer_reviews.title: Even made for the husky ones
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a MEGA fatty & this holds him beautifully. I'd give it full stars if it wasnt off center. I have to hang it at an odd angle to make it go straight. Stil blown away my big cat can use it!
customer_reviews.author: Rowan & Graham

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cat perch!
customer_reviews.text: This Kitty Cot is such a simple design, but so awesome. My kitty didn't know what to think at first, but now she just loves it. She can sit and watch the birds and it is very comfy for her to sleep on. She uses it all the time now. This is just an outstanding product. It grips tightly to the window and will not loosen or fall. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Findley

customer_reviews.title: Two Paws Up!
customer_reviews.text: At first Ms. Emma was nervous about it. I tried enticing her to sit on it by playing with a ribbon with her on it. She still tried to sit underneath it on the window sill as she was used to. Then I added the blanket (also found on Amazon) that I plan on only using for Emma's perch. Well luckily it was a sunny day, now she loves it! Human-friendly too. The suction cups were easy to assemble, and are super sturdy. Recommend keeping lower, when I tried higher for better view, she wasn't happy with it. Cats, go figure! She also loved the box it came in :)
customer_reviews.author: Claire Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST cat beds on the planet
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST cat beds on the planet. We saw these for the first time at an all glass interior animal shelter and thought they were amazing many years ago and then just recently found out who made them and where we could buy them. Our cats absolutely LOVE these beds. We have built a whole corner area for them leading up to these beds (bunk bed style on the sliding glass doors) and they are always in these beds. They are clean and streamlined so they don't take up much space. Well made and really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S. Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Cat is in love
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been perfect! I will say though a few weeks in it fell. I added hot glue to the suction cups and it fixed the issue. My cat isn't huge either but she does pounce around pretty rough so she likely just jumped on it too hard. You'll want to order a bed pad to put on top to make it more comfortable. She's in it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: S. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the cheap kitty perch first and it was terrible, it wouldn't stick to our window and the suction gave out while or cat was sitting on it and he went crashing to the floor. I decided to pay the extra for this Kitty Cot and it works great. The suction has held for 5 months now. It's a solid product. Our cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I stuck a folded towel on top and within a day both cats were sleeping there, even together. I'm glad I sprung for this one rather than the cheaper version. This one seems well built and very solidly attached to the window. It's pricey, but worth it. Just don't plan on closing your blinds or curtains. EDIT: After 6 months, this thing has fallen off of the window a few times; it seems to be only the bottom suction cups that are failing. I've now stuck them between the window and the frame to keep the platform upright.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Your Milage My Vary
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates it. Maybe she is broken but she refuses to use it. The suction cups work well if you follow the directions. If you place it in a window that gets different light throughout the day the suction cups may give. We found that in some windows it didn't matter what we did, it would eventually fall. Others, we had no issues. If is definitely sturdy can support our cats weight without issue. She just seems happier sitting and sleeping on the window ledge than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Sarchet

customer_reviews.title: My cats absolutely love this cot
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love this cot! The suction cups are sturdy, never falls from window. My cats about 13.5lbs. The reason for the 3 stars is because I bought this last May (2017) and the cot material is all unraveling. It's made of hard strings so it's not like I can sew it up or glue it. I wish they sold replacements to slip back on to the piping shell of the cot. It's on its last leg and I cant bring myself to spend $44 on another since it hasn't even been one year of use. Just to note, my cats do not claw at the cot material.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We live in an RV and needed a spot for our kitty to eat and keep his food away from our dog. (We also purchased a suction food bowl). It’s kind of ugly on its own (in my opinion), so I covered the seat with a small faux fur rug I had and it looks way better and our kitty loves how cozy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: It was great until after just a few months when the bottom suction cups lost its shape and lost suction. The company did not even respond to my inquiry. Turns out this is a known problem hence they are selling those suction cups separately.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Domingo

customer_reviews.title: 3 cats, different sizes and weights.
customer_reviews.text: I've removed this and stuck it back on several times, it holds each and every time. 3 cats. My roommated maincoon giant [he's lovely], one tortsie shell, and one blonde calico. It's held the tortoise shell and blonde bengal mix together with no issues. It's held all 3 separately, repeatedly without issues. All 3 can't fit on it together or I'm sure they would. I'll be buying this as a Christmas present for several people I know. There's almost always a cat on it. I also move it to give them different views. After about 2mos, they still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great durability - worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I'd bought a cheaper one first from another source, but it quickly became loose on the connecting points, and the fabric didn't stay shut with the velcro (or snaps I added, or sewing, or anything else). I don't have heavy cats, but when they jump up, you don't want the hammock part to slide open or for it to bump off the window. The solid construction and completely connected hammock make this the sturdiest one I've found. Excellent product, and my cats love watching out the window on the 2nd floor!
customer_reviews.author: NWMoominmamma

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars all the way
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kitty Cot! I had been looking at others at the store that I just wasn't that crazy about. I was sceptical at first if this one would come crashing down but after reading other reviews I decided to give it a try. I am amazed at how strong it is. This cot is not going anywhere! I cleaned the back door real well and hung it up. That is where he is most of the time trying to look out. I am going to make a soft padded cover to go over it to add a little extra comfort. It will help it blend into its surroundings a little better. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Stover

customer_reviews.title: The Reviews Don't Lie--This Really Is The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Our boy Bruce kept climbing on the kitchen table to sunbathe, and clearly needed a window perch! This one looked too good to be true--no screws? No nails? But the reviews were so positive, I risked it. My sceptical spouse was sure that this wouldn't work, but he put it up, we lined it with a fluffy fleece blanket, and within the hour Bruce was ensconced there. It is secure to the window, and I won't say anything more than thank you to the maker, because the pictures say it all! Buy this for your cats!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love this!
customer_reviews.text: You will not be disappointed with this. I bought the large for my 2 kitties and they both can fit on there. 1 does hog all the space, but when he wants to share, they really can both fit comfortably on the large cot. It has stayed up for months with the suction cups, and I have had no problem with it falling down. Very sturdy too. Both of my kitties are at least about 20 pounds together, and it is staying put since first time I put it up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christie Tracey

customer_reviews.title: "A perch with a view"
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy to have choosen this for my cat. Since I live in an apartment I don't have much space for a cat tree. I got this a couples days ago and my Maisy already is liking it a lot!! Hope it last a long time.. I am just praying for the suction to last.. Should I re do it every few times or should I just let it be? If someone have some feedback about this subject, please share some advise. I would hate to see her falling and getting scare of it.. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivette C. Davila

customer_reviews.title: Miss. Pockets approves!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this KittyKot “ Deluxe Model” for my cat Pockets. It was an absolute hit, worth EVERY PENNY! She LOVES it! - She weighs about 9.5lb and it is certainly sturdy enough for her to jump on it. - With the perch being 24”X17” she has plenty of space to stretch out and relax.
customer_reviews.author: Pockets

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but the cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this but the price. It is a bit high for something like this but he does have the disclaimer on how basic the parts are on his website so will give him the full 5 stars. I’m impressed at the suction cups as my 3 yr old unknowingly climbed on to it with my kitty and it didn’t come tumbling down. Actually it didn’t really even move. My cat does not like the material but it is easy to clean and I simply put her blanket on there and she’s good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: so bought two of these and my cats loved them so much then they failed and the cats fell in the middle of the night and now they refuse even after a few months to go near them. and yes I even invested in new cups to avoid this from happening what a waste of money, yes I clean the window yes to everything as I had read how some people had this issue. I have to give it one star even though my cats love it because there is no way for this company or any others to fix this issue. so better safe to buy the kind that hooks on
customer_reviews.author: BellaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feline approved
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Kitty Cot I have purchased. I have 3 cats and they LOVE these. I have had no issues with the suction cups. I try to remember to check them once a week to ensure they are still engaged fully. The cats spend hours lying in these and watching outdoor life. I'll also give a shout out to the owner/creator of Kitty Cot who made a short YouTube video to answer a question that I had regarding the cable length and needing shorter cables to fit a smaller window pane. Plus he answered the question within an hour of me posting it!
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure if this would really work and be sturdy and I must say - we love it. We have had it for a couple years and it is used by our three cats daily. Two at the same time like to cuddle on it. I put a nice soft blanket on it on our sliding glass door and cat trees near to jump onto cot. The cats love it and it never has come off when place on the window properly. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty Arya loves her Kitty Cot! I initially was nervous about installing it correctly (as I think I read too deep between the lines) but instructions were super easy to understand! Our kitty can now be found lounging and sunning herself (perch is set on most sun-exposed side) and loves every second of it! It's a great place for her to look outside. We have a small apartment and it doesn't get in the way or come out too far for space. We put a small hand towel on and she sleeps comfortably. Now she can watch the outside world while resting peacefully. I highly recommend this perch.
customer_reviews.author: DaniGirl

customer_reviews.title: The kittens love it but it keeps coming off the window
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure about this yet. The kittens love it but it keeps coming off the window, I don't know if my house is too cold or what but I'm worried the kittens will get hurt and as they get bigger, I'm not sure it will hold them
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Such great quality! We purchased a cheaper one through Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Such great quality! We purchased a cheaper one through Amazon prior to this and hated it (it could not suction to anything). This has a really sturdy and strong suction and holds really well! I'm never nervous about it falling, especially with my cat on it. The bed part is a little rough/hard which I'm not a fan of, but I bought a tiny rug to place on top of it and my cat loves it. It's a really great way to let your cat watch the outside world if they're an indoor only cat, or just a personal napping spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, if pricey, replacements for the original
customer_reviews.text: In functionality and dimensions, these suctions cups are the exact same as the ones that come with the original Kitty Cot. I have no complaints there, as the original set lasted me over 4 years with daily use from a 13-lb cat. My only complaint is that it seems a little pricey, but better than getting a knockoff that doesn't work as well I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna Bellamont

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when my cats were smaller, they are only 7 months now but look like they are a large breed. They both love it and can often be found in the cot sleeping. I bought a cheap blanket to put on it since the material isn't that inviting, they definitely prefer it covered. My only complaint is that I have had to reattach it more than I should, for the cost. I followed the directions fully and the cot has fallen while being used solo and shared. I have no comparison, so I can't say it is any better than a cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: BrianneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My Jack is about 16 pounds. I thought for sure he wouldn't ever be able to enjoy it, but figured my smaller cats could. Turns out it's his favorite spot! It's held up very stable for a few weeks of periodic use. Jack often sleeps there for a few hours. I'm impressed with the suction. Installation was easy, it took a little assembly and I cleaned and dried the glass before applying the suction cups. I put a cozy bed there, the hammock itself is nylon and not comfortable. Most of my cats ignore it, surprisingly, but that's more if a statement about cats being weird. The quality if this is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love this cot
customer_reviews.text: I have a sunroom where I keep my foster kittens. I wanted something besides a cat tree that they could sit or lay on in the sun or watch the birds and chipmunks outside. Every kitten I have fostered has used the cot whether it’s for sleeping, sun bathing or even playing. I’m glad I made this purchase. One thing you need to do is check the suction cups frequently. I’ve noticed too that the cups tend to get less powerful after a few months. So I check them daily now. I make it part of my kitten cleaning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cats who love to sit with you while you work!
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this. To death. I have it at the window for 4 months now and it did not budge. You know how cats love to stay next to you on the desk when you work? And they come and lay on your keyboard? I stopped having that issue anymore because my desk is next to the window and now my cat has a good spot to surveil the neighborhood while sitting next to me when I work. I matched it with and it's perfect! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it would be nice if it included a topper that fits. Right now I’m using a folded pillowcase until I can find something better. But so far, after over a week the large size perch is strong enough to hold both of my cats (together they are under 25lbs) and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Great in theory
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats absolutely loves this. I have it installed on a large floor to ceiling window. Unfortunately after about nine months of use one of the suction cups is very flat and won’t stick to the window any longer. I followed all installing recommendations, none of my cats are bigger than 10 pounds. I speculate that perhaps they can’t hold up to the extreme heat. I live in Houston and the window gets extremely hot in the summer. I did buy the replacement suction cups because my one cat does absolutely love this perch. It’s a great idea, but it sounds like it may have trouble holding up in extreme weather temperatures hot or cold.
customer_reviews.author: Cwhite

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for 9 months now. The suction cups worked very well with our hot weather (over 113 f sometimes). Only had to replace 1 cap due to my +35 pounds nephew trying to climb it many times. My cat spends at least 5 hours daily on it enjoying a sun bath or observing birds and traffic. I think it is an excellent purchase, specially that it can be relocated and stored easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Alemadi

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for our kitten!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! My kitten LOVES it. We added a blanket that she likes to re top of it, and she spends the majority of her time up on the Kitty Cot. It's extremely well made and the suction cups are heavy duty! It's wider than expected, so I would measure your window before buying, but it's 100% worth it if you have a cat that loves to look outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Truly very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from this perch and feared I'd regret spending so much on it. But it's extremely sturdy and high-quality; I feel safe having my cats jump into it. The suction cups are super-strong. But do measure your windows! It doesn't fit where I wanted it to go--in fact, the only windows in my house where it does fit are in the living room. All of our other windows seem like a "normal" size to me but are in fact narrower than this. I could probably disassemble it and cut the frame to the right size, but they seem perfectly happy to have it where it is.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: my cats love this (just not each other)
customer_reviews.text: OMGosh, my cats love this (just not each other). I am going to buy another one, so each cat will have their own window perch. After reading the other reviews, I made sure my window was clean (I used vinegar for cleaning). This perch is easy to put together, stable, sturdy and handles the stress my cats put it under.
customer_reviews.author: gicarole

customer_reviews.title: Great Booby Trap for Sleeping Cats
customer_reviews.text: I set this up on different windows across the house to make sure there wasn't an issue with the glass quality. Unfortunately, the suction cups failed on both my double-pane windows and my slider. It was admittedly funny to see the sleeping cat repeatedly fall for the trap door but, in its current implementation, it's unreliable as a comfy window shelf for my orange tabby.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and the cats already love it
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this perch! All sturdy items, easy to assemble, and seems like it will hold up to cats scratching and biting the materials! Just set this up today, so I will update if anything falters! The cats seem happy to have some added real estate in the sunny window!
customer_reviews.author: Frank T Zimmerer

customer_reviews.title: Took time but kitty  now obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I had to do the modification for my window size -- very easy. My cat wanted nothing to do with this for 6 weeks, but I kept it up and now when I put it down to hang at night (no one needs him yelling at the feral cat that wanders into our yard at 3 am) he complains, then runs to it first thing in the morning. I call it his tv -- it is truly wonderful enrichment. The cot is sturdy beyond all belief -- my cat is only 10lb but he is RAMBUNCTIOUS and has lept onto this thing at speed multiple times. It hasn't budged. Thank you, Kitty Cot, for keeping my cat entertained and happy.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review!***Give It a Chance
customer_reviews.text: At first they didn’t like it to the point where i was going to donate it to the shelter, and then one day, for no reason, both cats became obsessed with it. They lounge in it during rain, sleet, snow, but especially during sunny times. They fight over it. Pictured here is my cat Oliver who got woken up by the thunderstorm. Dont let the long face fool you. He loves his kittykot. UPDATED REVIEW: So they love their kittycot I bought a second one since they fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: CaCO3

customer_reviews.title: my cat loves this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: at first my cat was unsure of the product but after showing her how to get on it, its her favorite product!! she loves laying in the sun and looking outside. its never fallen its very sturdy! she is an average sized cat, so im not sure how it would handle bigger cats but its awesome otherwise. no complaints (only thing id hope would be a cushion or a cute color, but i just added a cute blanket on for comfort and aesthetic)
customer_reviews.author: Allison Leon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for sill-less windows
customer_reviews.text: Since we don't have any window sills this product was a perfect solution for us. I also love the fact that it doesn't require any screwing or taping that causes permanent damage to the house. Super easy to install, just read the directions. Though my cat didn't love it at first, now she's pretty content with it.
customer_reviews.author: My2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our 11 cats
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for a while now. At 1st I nearly returned it. It fell off the first few days. But I tried one more time. And it's been up a long time without issues. We have 11 cats ranging from 8lbs-20lbs. Even our 20lb cat loves it. There is always at least one cat on it. It has not fallen since we 1st bought it. Great buy. Cats love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT ALREADY !!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AMAZING. TRULY, AMAZING. not only was the set up incredibly easy, but my cat primmie (primrose) loves it! Once I put her on there, she stayed and found refuge in her little home within a home. It keeps her safe from those "pesky" dogs that don't seem to get the hint sometimes, and she loves it for sunbathing. I definitely recommend following the instructions and ensuring your window is clean, that the spot isn't too high, and that you check on the suctions once in awhile. THEY WILL STAY! they are incredibly heavy duty and have caused no problems whatsoever. thanks kitty cot! :+) <3
customer_reviews.author: elliot :-)

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have four kitties and two of them have taken to this thing very well. They even sleep in it together, and it holds both of them at once with no issue (over 20 lbs combined weight). My only complaint is that the bottom right suction cup has never stayed on properly - I fix it every few days - but even when it's detached, the shelf has never fallen off my window.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but after reading the reviews I decided to take the leap and buy this floating cat bed. I could not be happier with this purchase. Most items we buy for our cats end up untouched, but my four cats absolutely love this perch and fight over it! It's firmly secured to my sliding glass door, and it hasn't fallen off once.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Falls down :-(
customer_reviews.text: I have had this thing for a few months and it falls down daily. The top suction cups stay fine, but the moment my cat tries to lay on the ledge, the ledge falls, which makes for a sad kitty and a sad me. I’ve tried arranging it in different windows, cleaning the windows and suction cups with alcohol, wetting the suction cup slightly, to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Cats love their cot.  Suction cups could be better.
customer_reviews.text: My cats absolutely love their kitty cot. Nothing makes them happier than watching the birds from the laziness of their cot. The cot itself was east to assemble. The most difficult part was the suction. One of the cups has been an ongoing problem. It has never quite stuck right. I've had to use hot water to remold the shape and hairspray to try to affix it. As long as you get good suction cups this is an awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: LoveUniqueItems

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out
customer_reviews.text: Cat seems to like it. Will jump up there on occasion to sniff things out. For me, I'm still trying to figure out if it is safe. Tried cleaning the window. Made sure to apply pressure to the suction cups. A couple of times they came off. It's a good concept. Materials seem sturdy with the exception of the suction cups. This seems to be the achilles heel for all of these cots. Overpriced for what it is, but if I can get that cat to like it I might buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Jace

customer_reviews.title: Mine wasn't secure?!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the entire thing was PVC pipes. My fault - I know. I guess I was just surprised that the entire thing was so expensive for having the majority of it composed of PVC pipes. The real issue I had with mine was that one of the holes was bigger than the other and then smaller inside, so when I went to put in the suction cup, it wouldn't safely stay. For the price and the quality, considering mine was flawed, I decided to return. I would consider trying a similar product, but I don't know that I would try this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Our cat (and the previous one) love the Kot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered replacement suction cups for our Kitty Cot. Had the Cot in picture window in kitchen of our previous home for several years. When we moved and I reinstalled Kitty Cot, suction didn't seem to work well any more as the Cot came loose several times. Replacing the suction cups did the trick! Our cat (and the previous one) love the Kot!!!
customer_reviews.author: gaknitter

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for my cat and my daughters cat. They are side by side on the window. It took 2 hrs before either one would try it out, but after they did, they won’t come down for hours and hours. Also they will jump from one to the other which is funny to watch! It’s definitely helping to keep them off my furniture! I’m amazed at how well they stay on the window. I had one suction cup give out and was sent a replacement immediately. I absolutely love and recommend the kitty cot!
customer_reviews.author: Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: Liam Neeson Approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th kitty cot (2 regular & 2 deluxe). They are so well made & the kitties lay on them for hours everyday. They absolutely love them! They look great & are very sturdy and durable. Easy to keep clean, we'd give them 10 stars if we could! Thank you for making Kitty Cots ♥ Liam Indio Neeson & Freya Moon
customer_reviews.author: Liam Indio Neeson

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I agree with some other reviewers. Once installed, the suction cups began drifting downward until the perch was at an angle.My cat is 10 pounds, but many people said their perch held multiple cats at one time...? My cat doesn't appear very fond of it, either. I will be returning this as from my personal experience, it isn't anything like most of the reviews. I plan to purchase what I've had in the past, a perch that attaches to the window sill so kitty can sit in front of an open window and the wall under the sill assists with holding the perch up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy M

customer_reviews.title: Holding up Well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it would work but holds 17# girl. My other cats seem disinterested. Wanted them to get sun when patio door closed. Started approx 8" from floor&gradually raised it, adding a stool to leap up. My 3 cats are 20yrs old. It has held with no problems. (I started low to ground in case it didn't hold. I was afraid theyd get spooked if it fell & it would end up being a waste of $$) So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Our tabby LOVES the one and only original Kitty Cot! We find him lounging on it all the time. We have bought towers with a perch and pet beds etc... but he uses the Kitty Cot 90% of the time when he wants to nap. We have it mounted on our balcony sliding door. If we want to close the blinds at night it is super simple to pull the pvc mounts off the bottom suction cups and then it can hang flush against the glass behind the blinds. I was skeptical because of the price, but I can say it is 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good Construction and Stays
customer_reviews.text: This has been up for a couple months now and the cats love it. I was hesitant because I itemize the materials used vs cost and hate spending over $40 for something that has $3.78 in materials even bought retail. But, construction is good and once I placed it I haven't had to do anything else. The cats were a bit hesitant to try it at first, but they got used to it and is a favorite spot to look out since none of my windows have much of a sill for them to perch on.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Meyle

customer_reviews.title: Simple, sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: My cat, despite being on a strict diet, is still not losing weight like I'd like due to her lack of activity, so I concocted a plan to put her food on this cat perch to encourage her to do some jumping. She's not huge but she's a decently heavy kitty at 13 lbs and this thing has held fast for almost a year now. She doesn't seem to like chilling on it otherwise but it's serving its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Yuan

customer_reviews.title: Worst suction cups ever! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awful, just like the ones that came with the cot. Complete ripoff. I'm writing this review just as it completely ripped off the window(again) from my small cat just sitting on it. No idea how these products get anything beyond 1 star. I've had to build a custom rig with industrial suction cups just to feel remotely safe as it constantly falls after 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: DanB

customer_reviews.title: Cat LOVES this window seat
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a new cat that would try to balance in the narrow window sill to look out back to watch the birds. We ordered the window seat to give her something more comfortable. For the first week she did not seem to understand it. But since then she is in it multiple times a day...she LOVES sitting there watching the birds and other critters on the patio. The suction is very strong and I had no problem getting the suction cups to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A Little Small, But Cats Love It
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous at first that I received a knockoff. I had watched the videos of how the guy makes and packages them, and mine did not come like that. It seems to be the real deal, though, and after a few days of ignoring it completely, my cats love it. It is smaller than I expected; my 11 month old cats look huge when they lay in it. They don’t seem to mind though. I ended up buying a soft pad (that is advertised as something to put in pet crates) to cover the mesh material. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Stays put incredibly well.  Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely amazed! Never in my wildest dreams did I actually believe the suction cups would hold this thing to the window but indeed they do! It is sturdy, cute, minimalistic, just perfect. I have my sofa near the window with this perch attached above the back cushion. It is the favorite spot for my Yorkie! She sits and watches outside, being elevated a bit yet can hop down when she wants. Five stars all the way! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: joan humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Good and strong---measure your window first!
customer_reviews.text: You need to ensure the window is clean and dry. You can't have it on a side slide window unless it's the size of a standard patio sliding door. I tried it on a side slide window that I never open, but it is off on the base distance that made it unstable. As long as you have one window surface it's strong. I put at lease 20lbs of pressur on it and it was fine. The suctions are large and work well. Measure the window first. I wish they made a 4" smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my third kitty cot, the first two were/are perfect. The new version has a cheaper, thinner plain black nylon fabric. Not at all close to sturdiness of the previous version. The material is very cheap and could easily be ruined by cat claws. The pipes also appear cheaper. The website clearly states that all Kitty Cots are multicolored.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lee

customer_reviews.title: So sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is amazing! My 13 pound cat is living her best life on this window perch. I got the deluxe version and I’m so glad that I did. I’ll definitely buy more. It was extremely easy to put together and it’s so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought It
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. The suction cups fall down after a couple of weeks, which is annoying but inevitable. The wires kind of concern me because their possiblity of hurting the cats, but none have gotten hurt yet. It's best to put a blanket on it that they're familiar with to make it more comfortable. I would like to see the width expanded as my cat likes to curl up & he looks a tad uncomfortable with the width now-then again that's probably my own perception. Glad I bought it though. The cats don't use it often, but it's probably just the location I put it at.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn_Raja

product_meta.title: Kitty Cot Original World's Best Cat Perch
product_meta.description: Size:Kitty Cot LargeBLACK Color Kitty Cot Original (Large) measures 25-1/2″ wide x 14″ deep (width measured from outside edges of suction cups on Kitty Cot). Actual frame dimension is 14" x 23-1/2". Minimum window glass for use is 25" wide x 21" high. Kitty Cots attach to glass windows, mirrors and smooth non-porous surfaces using four PATENTED Giant Suction Cups made in the USA. Each cup is rated for 12 pounds so the Kitty Cot will hold about 25 pounds of cat(s). Kitty Cots work indoors and outdoors. The frame is made of PVC plastic pipe and fittings. It’s not glued together so it can be taken apart. The Kitty Cot hammock is a super-tough black nylon fabric called “Tiger-Mesh”. It’s so strong that it’s virtually impossible to rip or tear, and cleans easily with soap and water. Our design is so simple that anyone can put it up, and best of all you need no tools to install it. Lay your cat's favorite blanket or pad down to make it even more bed-like and comfortable. Install it next to an outside bird feeder or another action location and your cat will be entertained for hours. Tips on Using Suction Cups: The care and use of suction cups is very simple. Make sure the suction cup is clean and free from debris. If the suction cup needs to be cleaned, wash in warm soapy water then dry gently with a lint-free cloth. Clean the surface you are applying the suction cup to. It won’t adhere well to a dirty surface. To enhance suction, a tiny dab of Vaseline or cooking oil may be rubbed on the rim of the cup. Press the cup all the way down, against the surface. The suction cup may need to be “burped” periodically by pressing down on it to remove any air that may have seeped in. Temperature and humidity variations may make a suction cup lose its grip. If bonded above 40 degrees Fahrenheit the cup will provide the most reliable service from -22 degrees to 120 degrees Fahrenheit. To remove the cup, simply pull up on the release tab to break the suction.
feature_bullets: Mounts to Windows using Giant PATENTED USA Suction Cups
Humane Society Approved and Easy to Clean with Soap and Water
Made with Super Tough 3/4" PVC Plastic Pipe and Fittings
We use only the BEST Outdoor and Rugged Fabric
Our Support Cables are 1/8" Steel to last Forever
